content: This may have been the most PERFECT thing I have read ever! I was going to pick out one quote, only to find another, that was just straight up honest and correct. I thought the Republicans had a corner on crazy with their pouting of the Obama presidency. “We are mad and taking our ball home.” The Democrats have shown that they can not only keep up with the Republicans, but surpass them in the whole, “throwing out the baby with the bath water” thing. I agree a wall around the entire U.S. would still be better than a war with a nuclear power and its allies.
